body:
# Welcome my place.

Hey, I'm Pierre. I'm working at [Landcare Research - Manaaki Whenua](http://www.landcareresearch.co.nz) in New Zealand.

## Talks

- *[In-Field Spectroscopy for High-Resolution Soil Organic Carbon Mapping](http://pierreroudier.github.com/bh-soc-mapping/20121208-NZSSS/index.html)*. ASSS-NZSSS Joint Conference, Hobart, 2012.
